Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: METHODS : Patients that received Botox injections for spasmodic dysphonia between January 2000 and October 2009 were evaluated .

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Botox |

In this paragraph, the only chemical entity mentioned is "Botox". Botox is a brand name for botulinum toxin, a neurotoxic protein produced by the bacterium Clostridium botulinum. However, since the paragraph specifically mentions "Botox injections", it is reasonable to assume that the chemical entity being referred to is Botox itself.
